thread.title: Tokyo Olympics 2020 medals to be made of recycled donated metal
thread.title_full: Tokyo Olympics 2020 medals to be made of recycled donated metal

author: India TV Sports Desk
title: Tokyo Olympics 2020 medals to be made of recycled donated metal
text:
Tokyo Olympics 2020 medals to be made of recycled donated metal Tokyo Olympics 2020 medals to be made of recycled donated metal Currently reading: Tokyo Olympics 2020 medals to be made of recycled donated metal #Tokyo Olympics , #Medal   Tokyo [ Published on: 01 Feb 2017, 23:39:31] The medals to be awarded to athletes in the 2020 Tokyo Olympics will me made from discarded electronic devices, said organizers of the international sporting event. 
Japanese citizens are being asked to give the organizing committee unwanted devices. 
Organizers say the program highlights the theme of sustainability and gives the whole nation a chance to participate in the preparations for the games. 
The organizing committee aims to collect as much as eight tons of metal which, after the production process, will result in two tons, an amount needed to produce 5,000 Olympic and Paralympic medals. 
Collection boxes will be set up throughout the country. The collection will end when the eight-ton target is reached. 
(With inputs from AP)
